translation.en: Mayday, mayday! We are under attack.
Under attack from our own people.
They just started shooting. They took out everyone.
translation.es: Comenzaron a disparar y mataron a todos.

translation.en: - Why are they doing this? - They're ours. What's happening?
translation.es: - ¿Qué hacen? - Están de nuestro lado. ¿Qué ocurre?

translation.en: How many are there?
They're everywhere! They're going for the command center.
translation.es: - ¿Cuántos son? - ¡Muchos! Se dirigen al centro de mando. Destruirán los interceptores.

translation.en: They're going to take out the interceptors.
translation.es: Se dirigen al centro de mando. Destruirán los interceptores. EE. UU. SOLO CUENTA CON DOS BASES

translation.en: They're killing us, they're killing everybody!
They reached the command center. I can't hold them off!
translation.es: Llegaron al centro de mando. ¡No puedo detenerlos!

translation.en: Somebody help us! Please, send help!
We've got to call SBX- 1.  We can't! They destroyed the transmitter!
translation.es: - Debemos llamar a SBX-1. - ¿Cómo? ¡Destruyeron el transmisor!

translation.en: This is Fort Greely. We have been overrun. Fort Greely--
translation.es: Aquí Fuerte Greely. Nos invadieron. Aquí Greely…

translation.en: Coming up on SBX- 1 now, Captain.
SBX- 1 this is Eagle 6- 7.
I got your new missile system specialist here with me.
translation.es: Traigo a la nueva especialista en misiles.

translation.en: Request permission to commence final approach.
Eagle 6- 7 this is SBX- 1, you're cleared for landing.
Welcome to the middle of nowhere.
translation.es: Bienvenidos al medio de la nada.

translation.en: Captain Collins, I'm Ensign Washington.
translation.es: Capitana Collins, soy la alférez Washington.

translation.en: Welcome to SBX- 1,
or should I say welcome back.
translation.es: Mejor dicho, qué bueno que regresó.

translation.en: - Thanks. - Colonel's waiting for you.
I heard you grew up in Spain at a base your dad was posted at.
translation.es: Oí que creció en España en una base militar con su padre.

translation.en: Come in.
Captain Collins reporting, sir.
At ease.
Good to see you again, JJ.
translation.es: Me alegra volver a verte, J. J.

translation.en: You remember Captain Welsh?
Yes, sir. You were just taking over when I rotated out.
translation.es: Sí, señor. Acababa de asumir cuando me fui.

translation.en: Don't you mean escaped?
Listen to this.
- Give us a minute, would you, Lou? - You bet.
translation.es: Dame un minuto, Lou. No hay problema.

translation.en: See if you can get us an update on that Russian sub.
translation.es: Averigua qué pasó con el submarino ruso.

translation.en: Well, as you can see,
everything's pretty much the way you left it.
Navy runs the boat, Army handles the missiles,
translation.es: La Marina se ocupa del barco, el Ejército de los misiles,

translation.en: and everyone wants to be anywhere but here.
- Have you spoke with the board? - Three times.
Showed them my record? My reviews? Everything.
translation.es: - ¿Vieron mi historial y mis evaluaciones? - Todo.

translation.en: This was the best you could do?
Sorry.
No, it's okay.
I thought I was done with this shit.
I know.
Never going to change, is it?
Thank you for taking me back.
For the record, I believed you from the start.
translation.es: Para que lo sepas, yo siempre te creí.

translation.en: We got you down here.
One of our guys nabbed your old room.
Sorry about that.
Oh, ma'am?
Just want to say all of us girls are really proud of what you did.
translation.es: Quiero decirle que todas las mujeres estamos orgullosas de lo que hizo.

translation.en: What happened to you, well it's…
translation.es: Lo que le pasó a usted… nos pasó a muchas de nosotras,

translation.en: It's happened to a lot of us,
translation.es: nos pasó a muchas de nosotras,

translation.en: and I just wanted you to know that.
translation.es: y solo quería que lo supiera.

translation.en: I need you in the command center with your sidearm now.
translation.es: Ven ya mismo al centro de mando con tu arma.

translation.en: We have an active shooter situation at Fort Greely.
translation.es: Hay un tiroteo en el Fuerte Greely.

translation.en: Outsider?
No, one of ours. Looks like more than one.
translation.es: No, de los nuestros. Quizá más de uno.

translation.en: Interceptors secure?  Unknown.
translation.es: - ¿El interceptor está a salvo? - No lo sé.

translation.en: How bad is it?
Greely's gone dark. No calls in or out.
We're getting all our information off Twitter.
Do we have Fort Greely on the line?
Not yet, sir.
You know what to do.
Is Greely being jammed? No. It's like someone turned off the system at the source.
translation.es: - ¿Bloquearon las trasmisiones? - No, apagaron el sistema desde allí.

translation.en: Corporal Rahul Shah. Joined us six months ago.
translation.es: Rahul Shah, cabo. Lleva seis meses aquí.

translation.en: Captain.
Corporal.
And you remember Beaver.
Miss me, Captain?
Not even once.
How's our Russian friend?
He's back.
Forty miles out and just sitting there like a turd in a swimming pool.
translation.es: Está a 64 kilómetros, flotando como caca en la piscina.

translation.en: - What friend? - Russian attack sub.
translation.es: ¿Qué amigo ruso? Submarino de ataque. Lleva meses husmeando.

translation.en: Been nosing about for months.
translation.es: Submarino de ataque. Lleva meses husmeando.

translation.en: Our subs keep chasing him away and he keeps coming back.
What the hell's going on up there?
Hey. We still on for tonight?
translation.es: Oye, ¿lo de esta noche sigue en pie?

translation.en: Dude, what?
Poker. I want to whip them janitors like last time.
translation.es: Póquer, quiero derrotar a los conserjes otra vez.

translation.en: - Not now, Beaver. - What's wrong with now?
We're in an emergency.
Man, this ain't no emergency.
It's one crackpot with a grudge.
I'd invite you, ma'am, but there'll probably be a bit of locker room talk.
translation.es: La invitaría, señora, pero diremos vulgaridades entre hombres.

translation.en: I've been practicing against some of the best players in the world with this little green guy.
translation.es: Practiqué contra los mejores jugadores con este pequeño.

translation.en: Thing's probably more powerful than this entire room.
translation.es: Tiene más potencia que toda esta sala.

translation.en: Great story, Beaver.
In what chapter do you shut the fuck up?
Copy that, STRATCOM.
Sir, SBX- 1 has just been assigned primary early warning status
translation.es: Señor, se nos asignó el estado de alerta primaria,

translation.en: while Greely's offline.
All right, as of this moment we're the only interceptor platform
translation.es: A partir de ahora, somos la única plataforma interceptora

translation.en: protecting the United States from a nuclear missile attack.
translation.es: capaz de proteger al país de un misil nuclear.

translation.en: Square your shit away. Focus on the job you've been trained to do.
translation.es: Olviden lo personal y céntrense en el trabajo.

translation.en: Sir, we sure this is not some kind of drill or emergency test--
translation.es: ¿No es un simulacro o una prueba de emergencia?

translation.en: Quiet.
NSA is relaying chatter from Russia.
Kremlin just received a priority alert from the ICBM missile base in Tavlinka.
translation.es: El Kremlin recibió una alerta de la base de misiles en Tavlinka.

translation.en: Tavlinka site under hostile attack.
Multiple casualties.
Unauthorized missile removal.
No way.
Sixteen Topol- M mobile missiles unaccounted for.
You're saying someone stole 16 ICBMs?
I'm not saying it. The Russians are.
translation.es: No lo digo yo, lo dicen los rusos.

translation.en: Sir, Greely goes dark
and within 10 minutes a Russian base reports stolen nukes?
translation.es: ¿y ahora un robo de armas nucleares rusas?

translation.en: Look, Greely's real, but this has to be a Russian exercise.
translation.es: Lo de Greely es real, pero esto debe ser un simulacro.

translation.en: If it were real, the Pentagon would've called us by now.
translation.es: Si fuera real, el Pentágono nos habría llamado.

translation.en: SBX- 1.
Yes, sir.
We are, sir.
It just came in now, sir.
We will, sir.
We have 16 missiles aimed at 16 American cities.
translation.es: Tenemos 16 misiles apuntados a 16 ciudades estadounidenses.

translation.en: After this day, America will no longer exist.
translation.es: Después de hoy, Estados Unidos ya no existirá.

translation.en: Jesus.
How do you steal nuclear missiles?
Had to have been an inside job. You can't just walk in--
translation.es: Debe haber sido un crimen interno, no…

translation.en: Doesn't matter how they did it. What matters is those missiles are mobile.
translation.es: Eso no importa. Son misiles móviles.

translation.en: They can hide their nukes anywhere. Our satellites won't spot them till they launch.
translation.es: Pueden ocultarlos en cualquier lugar y es imposible detectarlos.

translation.en: Captain.
JJ.
This is on us now, you understand?
Yes, sir.
We're the only thing standing between America and Armageddon.
translation.es: Solo nosotros podemos impedir el fin de EE. UU.

translation.en: You up for this?
Don't worry about me, sir.
Sorry. Had to ask.
I'll start the emergency lockdown. You do that.
translation.es: - Iniciaré el cierre de emergencia. - Muy bien.

translation.en: I need to find Welsh and secure the HVAR codes.
translation.es: Buscaré a Welsh para proteger los códigos EAAV.

translation.en: Sir, wait
Sir.
If they had people inside Tavlinka, and the shooters at Greely were all ours,
translation.es: Si había infiltrados en Tavlinka y en el ataque al Fuerte Greely,

translation.en: they might have someone… here.
Go.
The keycard!
The keycard! Get the keycard!
Mikael! The door. Open the door!
Goddammit, you're a big boy.
Did you send the SOS?
Did you just stab that dude in the eye with your gun?
translation.es: ¿Lo apuñalaste en el ojo con tu arma?

translation.en: Yeah. Did you send the SOS?
Yeah, I sent it. They told me to stand by.
translation.es: Sí, lo envié. Me dijeron que esperara.

translation.en: How is Beaver?
Bullet clipped him. He's unconscious, but he'll be okay.
translation.es: La bala lo rozó. Se desmayó, pero se repondrá.

translation.en: Is that acid?
Why would they bring acid?
Destroy the circuitry.
Make this place useless.
What are we going to do?
You want to talk about it?
Leave now and you might escape with your life.
translation.es: Váyanse ya y quizá salgan con vida.

translation.en: Let me in
and you might escape with yours.
You are the terrorists who stole the missiles from Tavlinka?
translation.es: ¿Eres el terrorista que robó los misiles?

translation.en: You know, it would be a hell of a coincidence if I wasn't.
translation.es: Sería una gran coincidencia si no fuera así.

translation.en: Put one on Beaver.
And the shooters at Greely?
Subcontractors.
It's a gig economy.
Can't work at a US base without an extensive background check.
translation.es: Hacen revisión de antecedentes para trabajar en una base militar.

translation.en: You're telling me. The paperwork is a nightmare.
translation.es: Ni que lo digas, hay mucho papeleo.

translation.en: That would mean you've been planning this--
For a very long time.
How long is a very long time?
Six years.
Not going so well for you, is it?
translation.es: No te está yendo muy bien, ¿no?

translation.en: No plan survives contact with the enemy completely intact.
translation.es: Ningún plan permanece intacto ante un contacto con el enemigo.

translation.en: Are we enemies? You sound American.
I am American.
And whether or not you and I are enemies
translation.es: Y la respuesta de si somos enemigos

translation.en: is completely up to you.
What's your name?
My name is Alexander Kessel.
You say that like I should know it.
And now that you do, you will never forget it.
translation.es: Pues ahora que sabes mi nombre, nunca lo olvidarás.

translation.en: How about I just call you asshole?
You know, usually it takes a woman a second date to reach that conclusion.
translation.es: Por lo general, solo me llaman así en la segunda cita.

translation.en: Nothing usual about me.
You know, I'm kind of getting that.
So, Captain, seems as though you and I are at an impasse
translation.es: Capitana, parece que tenemos un problema.

translation.en: because I need to disable your command center
translation.es: Debo desactivar tu centro de mando

translation.en: so my people in Russia can fire those missiles.
translation.es: para que mi equipo dispare los misiles.

translation.en: And you need to keep me out.
But, full disclosure,
I have contained or killed everyone else on this vessel,
translation.es: aprisioné o maté a todos los demás en la nave,

translation.en: so I will be getting into that room.
translation.es: así que entraré a esa sala.

translation.en: Let me in now
and I will spare your lives.
And let millions of Americans die?
I don't think you realize why someone joins the Army.
translation.es: ¿No entiendes por qué nos unimos al ejército?

translation.en: You are alone in the middle of the ocean,
translation.es: Están solos en medio del océano,

translation.en: miles from any port,
way beyond the nearest shipping lane.
translation.es: lejos de cualquier ruta de navegación.

translation.en: No one is going to be able to get here and save you
translation.es: Nadie podrá llegar aquí a salvarlos

translation.en: before I cut through these doors.
translation.es: antes de que atraviese las puertas.

translation.en: Hey, Shah, how many janitors are there?
I don't know. Six, seven?
- Which is it, six or seven? - I don't know. I didn't hire them.
translation.es: ¿Seis o siete? No lo sé, no los contraté yo.

translation.en: This is a big rig. You couldn't have killed everyone so quickly.
translation.es: Es una plataforma grande, no puedes haber matado a todos.

translation.en: Nerve agent.
Released it through the A/C. Put 'em all right to sleep.
translation.es: Lo diseminé por el aire acondicionado.

translation.en: Bullshit.
If it makes any difference, they felt nothing.
We did have to shoot them to be sure.
translation.es: Pero les disparamos por las dudas.

translation.en: Don't worry.
The command center has its own A/C, and try as I might…
translation.es: La sala tiene otro sistema. Por más que quiera…

translation.en: You can't access it.
Would we be having this awesome little conversation if I could?
- SBX- 1. This is Captain Collins. - Is this real?
- General Dyson. Where's Colonel Marshall? - Everyone quiet.
translation.es: Soy el general Dyson. ¿Y el coronel?

translation.en: He's dead, sir.
Dead? What happened?
Six to seven terrorists disguised as janitors seized our vessel.
translation.es: Unos terroristas disfrazados de conserjes tomaron la nave.

translation.en: They killed Marshall, they claim they have killed the crew,
translation.es: Mataron a Marshall y a los demás, e intentaron tomar el centro de mando.

translation.en: - and tried to take the command center. - Tried?
translation.es: Mataron a Marshall y a los demás, e intentaron tomar el centro de mando. - ¿Lo intentaron? - Y fallaron.

translation.en: - And failed. - Who's there with you?
Corporals Shah and Baker.
Baker's unconscious. Hit by a bullet.
translation.es: Baker se desmayó, lo rozó una bala.

translation.en: How secure are you?
They're using blowtorches to cut through the outer door.
translation.es: Intentan cortar la puerta externa con sopletes.

translation.en: Best guess…
Sixty minutes.
Make that 30 minutes.
- And the inner door? - Same. I don't know.
translation.es: - ¿Y la puerta interna? - Igual. No lo sé.

translation.en: What can you tell us about these terrorists?
American. Leader says his name is Alexander Kessel.
translation.es: Son de EE. UU. El líder se llama Alexander Kessel.

translation.en: Get me a full background check on this guy. What else?
translation.es: Quiero una investigación de antecedentes. ¿Qué más?

translation.en: They move like they've been trained,
and they're using nerve agents.
What's happening at Greely? Shooters are dead.
translation.es: - ¿Qué pasó en Greely? - Los atacantes murieron.

translation.en: Unfortunately, so are the computers that control the interceptors.
translation.es: Pero fundieron el sistema de interceptores.

translation.en: Burned them all with acid.
So it's just us.
Afraid so.
A SEAL team is inbound to you.
You have to hang on a little longer.
- ETA? - Ninety minutes.
Are they joking?
- No, we are not joking. - Madam President.
The terrorists have 16 mobile missile launchers
that we and the Russians cannot find.
Only reason they haven't launched them yet
is because you still have control of your interceptors.
translation.es: únicamente porque ustedes aún controlan sus interceptores.

translation.en: The second you don't, they will launch those missiles on the United States.
translation.es: En cuanto pierdan el control, lanzarán esos misiles contra nuestro país.

translation.en: Now, we don't have time to evacuate 16 cities,
translation.es: No tenemos tiempo de evacuar 16 ciudades,

translation.en: so we're counting on you to keep those maniacs out of that room.
translation.es: así que contamos con ustedes para evitar que accedan a esa sala.

translation.en: Understood, Madam President.
We'll get back to you soon. Keep us updated.
Yes, sir.
Captain, hold that room.
Let's move out! Go!
SEAL team, you are clear for immediate departure to SBX- 1.
translation.es: Equipo especial, tienen permiso para dirigirse a SBX-1.

translation.en: Ninety minutes? There's no way we can last that long.
translation.es: ¿Noventa minutos? No podremos aguantar tanto tiempo.

translation.en: Not without a fight.
What? No. No, no.
I'm not a fighter. I'm a signal specialist.
translation.es: Yo no peleo, soy especialista en señales.

translation.en: I sit at a desk and stare at a screen, and know what? I like it.
translation.es: Mi trabajo es mirar una pantalla, y lo disfruto.

translation.en: Know why? Because nothing ever happens.
I mean, I haven't fired a gun since basic.
translation.es: Hace años que no disparo un arma.

translation.en: Don't worry. Guns still work the same.
Look, you can't count on me. You can't.
translation.es: No puede contar conmigo. En serio.

translation.en: You surrender?
Do you?
Still quite enjoying fucking up your day.
translation.es: Todavía me da placer arruinar tu día.

translation.en: Do you know anything about the fall of Rome?
translation.es: ¿Sabes algo de la caída de Roma?

translation.en: When the barbarians massed outside the city gates
translation.es: Los bárbaros se agolparon en las puertas

translation.en: they did unspeakable things to try and force the Romans to let them in.
translation.es: y cometieron atrocidades para que los romanos los dejaran entrar.

translation.en: The result justifies the deed.
You remember Captain Welsh?
He's a father of four and a grandfather of seven.
translation.es: Tiene cuatro hijos y siete nietos.

translation.en: This is not gonna work.
Open the doors.
You can't let him die.
I will not open these doors.
If you don't, I will kill him.
translation.es: Si no lo haces, lo mataré.

translation.en: I will not open these doors.
Last chance.
Kill anyone you want.
I will never open this door.
We're going to die too, aren't we?
We are not gonna die.
They're gonna get in here. They're gonna kill us.
- Corporal. - There's nothing we can do to stop them!
Corporal Shah, they're not in here yet,
translation.es: Cabo Shah, aún no entraron a esta sala.

translation.en: but if we're going to keep them out, I need you thinking clearly.
translation.es: Para evitar que lo hagan, debes pensar con claridad.

translation.en: We still have a job to do, right?
Right.
So go back to your post and keep our scanners on Tavlinka.
translation.es: Regresa a tu puesto y sigue monitoreando la base en Tavlinka.

translation.en: And if they launch?
We intercept.
We also need to figure out every way they can penetrate this room.
translation.es: Debemos pensar en cómo pueden entrar a esta sala.

translation.en: Tunnel's the only direct way, in or out.
translation.es: El túnel es la única vía directa.

translation.en: What about indirect? Any new piping or conduits I should know about?
Plumbing comes through a conduit in the floor too small for anyone to fit through.
translation.es: La plomería pasa por un conducto que es muy pequeño.

translation.en: Same for the cables.
What else could they do? Think.
What about blowing the radar dome?
Dome's reinforced even stronger than we are.
Same with the interceptors.
Get me eyes outside the hatches, top and bottom.
Get the shotgun.
Shoot him!
Shoot him now!
Looks like it was just the one.
When was the last time this thing was test fired?
I don't know. Can it still work?
Not without blowing up in your face.
translation.es: No sin explotarte en la cara.

translation.en: - What about your pistol? - Out.
So we have no weapons.
Help me.
Thanks for saving Turbo.
Who?
Turbo, the turtle. My kids gave him to me.
translation.es: Turbo, la tortuga. Fue un regalo de mis hijos.

translation.en: How many kids you got?
Prisha, she's nine. Aditi, seven. And Kalyan, he's three.
translation.es: Prisha, de nueve años. Aditi, de siete. Y Kalyan, de tres.

translation.en: I haven't seen them for six months.
Best thing you can do for them now is help me stop those missiles.
translation.es: Lo mejor que puedes hacer por ellos es ayudarme a detener esos misiles.

translation.en: Anything?
They got everyone.
He's just going to keep buzzing till you answer.
translation.es: No dejará de sonar si no contesta.

translation.en: What do you want now?
Captain, you should see this.
Think you're the first one to throw that in my face?
translation.es: ¿Crees que es la primera vez que veo eso?

translation.en: Think you're gonna break me?
And yes.
- It's gonna take more than that. - I've got more coming.
translation.es: Necesitarás algo mejor. - Tengo más cosas. - No es cierto.

translation.en: No, you don't.
translation.es: - Tengo más cosas. - No es cierto.

translation.en: You're scrambling.
- Am I? - Desperately.
How so?
You're a planner.
Six years, you said.
Looking for ways to beat the security, getting your people aboard,
translation.es: Investigaste las medidas de seguridad, plantaste gente a bordo.

translation.en: you must have gone over and over these things
translation.es: Debes haber repasado el plan una y otra vez

translation.en: until you were absolutely sure you planned for every possible outcome,
translation.es: hasta estar seguro de haber previsto todo resultado posible.

translation.en: but you couldn't plan for me.
translation.es: Y no planeaste que estuviera yo.

translation.en: You know how I know?
Because I'm meant to be in Fort Hunter right now on my new post.
translation.es: Porque iba a estar en el Fuerte Hunter en mi nuevo puesto.

translation.en: Only fell through late last night when they reassigned me here.
translation.es: Hubo un cambio de planes anoche y me enviaron aquí.

translation.en: And now…
Now you can't beat me.
I'll give you unexpected.
But not unbeatable.
See, here's what I know.
I know that three years ago, you scored your dream job.
translation.es: Sé que hace tres años obtuviste el trabajo de tus sueños.

translation.en: Pentagon, three- star General.
translation.es: En el Pentágono, con un general condecorado.

translation.en: A battlefield hero, his troops loved him.
translation.es: Un héroe, sus tropas lo amaban.

translation.en: They were going to build a statue to the guy.
And he promised to take you all the way to the top,
translation.es: Y prometió llevarte con él hasta la cima…

translation.en: but then you learned the price you'd have to pay.
translation.es: pero luego supiste lo que te costaría.

translation.en: I know the Army review board just decided you made it all up.
translation.es: Sé que la junta militar decidió que era un invento tuyo.

translation.en: Threw you right back into the lion's den.
translation.es: Te ordenaron volver a la cueva del lobo.

translation.en: I know that three- star welcomed you with open arms.
translation.es: Sé que el general te recibió con los brazos abiertos.

translation.en: Because predators always want to show you exactly who's in charge.
translation.es: Los acosadores siempre quieren demostrar que ellos tienen el poder.

translation.en: Wait, that general got discharged.
translation.es: Al general le dieron la baja.

translation.en: Which means you beat him. You won.
translation.es: Eso significa que lo venció, ganó.

translation.en: She won the battle, not the war.
translation.es: Ganó la batalla, no la guerra.

translation.en: See, first came the hate mail.
The bounty hunt for these lewd photos…
translation.es: PERRA MENTIROSA Búsquedas de fotos sugestivas.

translation.en: …then the death threats.
All from within the army that you so proudly served.
translation.es: De tus compañeros del ejército en el que serviste con orgullo.

translation.en: Then finally…
that night.
JJ! JJ!
JJ, come on!
Come on, wake up. JJ!
Come on. Wake up. Come back.
Papa?
It's okay, it's okay. Papa's here. It's okay. I got you.
Papa… sorry.
You are beatable, Captain.
It's been proven.
If you are so right,
then what am I doing here?
Why do I still wear the uniform?
War's not over yet, motherfucker.
translation.es: La guerra no ha terminado, idiota.

translation.en: You should be working with me.
In fact, I will give you 30 million dollars if you open these doors.
translation.es: Te daré 30 millones de dólares si abres esas puertas.

translation.en: I will have you flown to the country of your choosing
translation.es: Haré que te lleven al país que quieras

translation.en: where you can live the rest of your life in luxury.
translation.es: donde podrás vivir en la opulencia.

translation.en: If anyone has earned the right to walk away from this, it's you.
translation.es: Si alguien se ha ganado el derecho de alejarse de esta vida, eres tú.

translation.en: Thirty million dollars.
What did the Army ever give you?
Your depressing old job in the middle of nowhere,
translation.es: ¿Un trabajo deprimente en el medio de la nada,

translation.en: where they can forget about you?
They don't care about you.
Open these doors.
Take back your power.
That's how you win a war.
SEAL team is inbound to SBX- 1. ETA 67 minutes.
translation.es: Equipo especial en camino. Llegada en 67 minutos.

translation.en: They're in.
Open the door and you leave here a wealthy woman.
translation.es: Abre la puerta y te irás de aquí con mucho dinero.

translation.en: We still have time before you cut through this door.
translation.es: Tenemos tiempo hasta que atravieses la puerta.

translation.en: - You really don't. -
- Beaver. - What?
Nice, Beaver.
Initiating satellite relay and EBS hack.
translation.es: Iniciando intervención del sistema de emergencia.

translation.en: We're in.
No, I have a new one.
ZSB, Zulu Sierra Bravo, 1- 9- 9- 6.
And tell Danny to move in.
Are you hurt?
I've had worse.
It really didn't have to be this way.
translation.es: No tenía por qué terminar así.

translation.en: If Corporal Baker doesn't get hit, we avoid all of this.
translation.es: Si tan solo Baker no se hubiera desmayado…

translation.en: If you're gonna kill me, just kill me.
No mansplaining.
I gave you choices.
It was your decision to become enemies.
You were with them this whole time?
Yeah.
Traitor.
America's the traitor.
Always were full of shit, Beaver.
Ah, what do you know?
I love my country.
Hell, there was a time I would have even died for it.
translation.es: Antes, hubiera dado la vida por defenderlo.

translation.en: Never too late.
Shut up.
It's because of immigrants like you
and like you
that I lost my job
and the government
took away my rights,
started making up all kinds of shit to scare me.
translation.es: e inventaron toda clase de cosas para asustarme.

translation.en: Shit.
I don't even recognize America these days.
translation.es: Últimamente ni siquiera reconozco este país.

translation.en: And that gives you the right to murder millions of people?
translation.es: ¿Y eso te da derecho a asesinar a millones de personas?

translation.en: Well, it gives me the right to start looking out for myself.
translation.es: Me da derecho a preocuparme solo por mí.

translation.en: And now I got ten million ways to do that.
translation.es: Y ahora tengo diez millones de maneras.

translation.en: Money? That's what this is about?
Uh, yeah.
It's what America's about.
And if you don't get that,
you obviously haven't been paying attention, Shah.
translation.es: obviamente no has prestado atención, Shah.

translation.en: Wake up, man.
Yeah, sure. Sure. Blame America. Blame the government.
translation.es: Sí, claro. Culpa al país. Culpa al gobierno.

translation.en: Blame everyone else but you.
translation.es: Culpa a todos excepto a ti mismo.

translation.en: That's what all losers do.
You just keep on talking, darlin'.
Because before this is all over,
translation.es: Porque antes de que esto termine,

translation.en: I'm gonna do to you
translation.es: lo que te haré a ti

translation.en: what every enlisted grunt secretly wants to do
translation.es: es lo que todos los soldados quieren hacerles en secreto a las superiores mujeres.

translation.en: to every female officer.
translation.es: quieren hacerles en secreto a las superiores mujeres.

translation.en: The only way you can get it, isn't it?
translation.es: Es el único modo que conoces, ¿no?

translation.en: Hey. Another thing.
Never call a woman by anything other than her name.
translation.es: Jamás llames a una mujer de otra forma que no sea su nombre.

translation.en: Not honey, or honey pie, or sugar, or sugar pie,
translation.es: Ni querida, ni queridita. Ni cielo, ni cielito.

translation.en: or sweetie, or sweetie pie.
Not baby, sweetheart, ho, bitch,
translation.es: Nada de nena, ni bebé, ni zorra, ni perra…

translation.en: and above all, most of all, beyond all else,
translation.es: pero, por sobre todas las cosas,

translation.en: don't ever, ever, call her darlin'.
translation.es: jamás llames a ninguna mujer cariñito.

translation.en: Satellite relay's live on the EBS.
The Emergency Broadcast System?
Yeah, so that every camera on this rig
translation.es: Sí, para que el video de las cámaras se transmita

translation.en: can be broadcast to any device that has smart capabilities.
Wouldn't want anyone missing the show.
Mr. Kessel. Where's Captain Collins?
translation.es: Sr. Kessel, ¿dónde está la capitana Collins?

translation.en: She's here. She's unharmed.
Well… relatively.
As is Corporal Shah.
translation.es: Al igual que el cabo Shah.

translation.en: And Corporal Baker?
Howdy, General.
You two are servicemen. You took an oath.
translation.es: Son parte del ejército. Hicieron un juramento.

translation.en: How could you betray your country?
I swore an oath to the old America. Not this one.
translation.es: Le hice un juramento al país de antes, no al de ahora.

translation.en: What do you want?
From you?
Nothing.
I'm just waiting for America to join our little chat here.
translation.es: Quiero hablar con todo el país.

translation.en: Dad's proud. That must be nice.
translation.es: Un padre orgulloso. Debe ser lindo.

translation.en: EBS has slaved all signals.
translation.es: La señal de emergencia es nuestra.

translation.en: Say hello to America, boss.
translation.es: Saluda a todo el país, jefe.

translation.en: So you know it's got a big screen, great picture quality, you know,
translation.es: Tiene una pantalla grande y una excelente calidad de imagen.

translation.en: the sound's kind of meh, but I don't really listen to the TV that much.
translation.es: El sonido no es bueno, pero no escucho mucho la televisión.

translation.en: I play music when I watch and stuff so it doesn't really…
translation.es: Siempre escucho música, así que no…

translation.en: Why'd it go black and white?
Where's the President?
I'm here.
If you launch even one of those missiles,
I swear before God that we will hunt you down
translation.es: les juro por Dios que los perseguiremos incansablemente

translation.en: and wipe you from existence.
That's enough. You're boring me.
I'm taking your bully pulpit now.
My fellow Americans,
I am Alexander Kessel,
son of trust fund billionaire, Alexander Kessel Senior,
translation.es: hijo del multimillonario Alexander Kessel padre.

translation.en: who you may also know
is the current utterly unqualified US ambassador to the United Nations.
translation.es: como el actual e incompetente embajador de EE. UU. ante las Naciones Unidas.

translation.en: Now, my associates in Russia control 16 nuclear missiles,
translation.es: Mis socios en Rusia controlan 16 misiles nucleares.

translation.en: and I control the only interceptor missiles
translation.es: Y yo controlo los únicos misiles interceptores

translation.en: that are capable of stopping them.
Sixteen American cities have been targeted.
translation.es: Tienen como objetivo 16 ciudades del país.

translation.en: 300 million of you will die.
One city will be destroyed first
translation.es: Una de esas ciudades será destruida primero

translation.en: so that the rest of you can watch in horror.
translation.es: para que el resto de ustedes atestigüen el horror.

translation.en: Missile team one…
fire.
Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected. Missile launch detected.
Intercept launch expires in 12 minutes.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en 12 minutos.

translation.en: Now in 12 minutes, that missile I just launched,
translation.es: En 12 minutos, el misil que acabo de lanzar

translation.en: will pass over my head,
at which point, it will be too late for this interceptor to catch it.
translation.es: y será demasiado tarde para que el interceptor lo alcance.

translation.en: But which city has been chosen?
Is it yours?
Wherever it lands, there's no time to run.
translation.es: No importa dónde. No podrán escapar.

translation.en: You can't flee.
If you guessed Los Angeles,
congratulations.
The City of Angels has 23 minutes left to live.
translation.es: A esta bella ciudad le quedan 23 minutos.

translation.en: Wait a second.
Once Los Angeles is gone,
And the fear of every American is at its peak…
translation.es: ¿Adónde van todos? Esperen, aún no es hora de cerrar.

translation.en: We're not closing yet.
translation.es: Esperen, aún no es hora de cerrar.

translation.en: …I will launch a second wave of 15 nuclear missiles.
translation.es: …lanzaré una segunda tanda de 15 misiles nucleares.

translation.en: Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Memphis, Chicago, St. Louis, Atlanta, Boston,
translation.es: Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Memphis, Chicago, San Luis, Atlanta, Boston,

translation.en: Philadelphia, Miami, New York.
And of course, Washington DC.
translation.es: Y, por supuesto, Washington D. C.

translation.en: Today…
America dies
in a paroxysm of fear.
translation.es: en un estado de terror puro.

translation.en: America is the greatest lie ever told.
translation.es: EE. UU. es el mayor engaño del mundo.

translation.en: American exceptionalism?
Maybe once.
When the founders got rid of kings.
translation.es: Cuando los fundadores rechazaron la monarquía…

translation.en: When they declared that all men are created equal.
Now they say ours are United States, but when was that true?
translation.es: El nombre es Estados Unidos, pero ¿es realmente así?

translation.en: Was it true during the Civil War?
Or Jim Crow?
Hell, is it true now?
You know, this national lie,
it's a festering wound,
and it's fatal.
There's no Band- Aid to patch it.
translation.es: No hay una venda que alcance.

translation.en: No, the only way to save our nation and the promise it once held
translation.es: La única forma de salvar nuestra nación y el potencial que tuvo alguna vez

translation.en: is to erase it.
Start over.
So maybe then. when we are staring at each other
translation.es: Tal vez, entonces, cuando crucemos miradas

translation.en: from across the rubble,
we will all agree that this time
translation.es: nos pondremos de acuerdo y esta vez…

translation.en: we're going to get America right.
This is Corporal Rahul Shah.
translation.es: Él es el cabo Rahul Shah.

translation.en: Do you like being an American, Rahul?
With all my heart.
But you're a Hindu.
You can be both.
In America?
You've never been mocked for your faith?
Never been the subject to enhanced screenings at airports?
translation.es: ¿No te han hecho controles adicionales en los aeropuertos?

translation.en: Share with the world what you've seen.
translation.es: Dile al país lo que viste.

translation.en: I've seen you in the showers,
translation.es: Te vi desnudo en las duchas…

translation.en: and I can see why you're obsessed with missiles.
translation.es: y entiendo que te obsesionen los misiles.

translation.en: Pathetic.
I got this, boss.
This is Captain Joanna Julia Collins.
translation.es: Ella es la capitana Joanna Julia Collins.

translation.en: JJ to her friends.
translation.es: Sus amigos la llaman J. J.

translation.en: A soldier who has fought with honor and courage here today.
translation.es: Una soldado que hoy ha luchado con honor y valor.

translation.en: Now, three years ago, one of our nation's top generals
translation.es: Hace tres años, un general muy importante de nuestro país

translation.en: tried to abuse his position of power and force her to have sex with him.
translation.es: intentó abusar de su poder y obligarla a tener sexo con él.

translation.en: Whose career was ruined?
You should be
showering her with praise,
but she's a woman,
so instead her fellow service members
translation.es: así que sus compañeros del servicio militar

translation.en: put out a bounty hunt on photos like this.
translation.es: ofrecieron recompensas a quien hallara fotos como esta.

translation.en: You're an asshole, dude.
I offered her 30 million dollars to give up her post today.
translation.es: Le ofrecí 30 millones de dólares para que renunciara a su puesto.

translation.en: She refused.
She took that photo for charity, by the way.
translation.es: La foto fue para un calendario benéfico.

translation.en: What position were you? Were you goalkeeper?
Goalkeeper. It's a tough position.
Beg your pardon?
You take a lot of hits, concussions, bruised ribs,
translation.es: Las porteras sufren muchos golpes, contusiones, fisuras de costillas…

translation.en: but the most common injury is dislocated thumbs.
translation.es: pero la lesión más común es la dislocación de pulgares.

translation.en: - - Oh shit.
No!
Shit!
Intercept launch expires in six minutes.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en seis minutos.

translation.en: Think you can make it?
Do you?
Intercept launch expires in five minutes.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en cinco minutos.

translation.en: You have five minutes. Hold her or kill her.
Interceptor launched.
Missile intercepted.
Fucking die already, would you?
Remember? I said, Whatever happens, make sure you shoot her first.
translation.es: ¿Lo recuerdas? Te dije que, sin importar qué pasara, debías matarla primero.

translation.en: You just take her out of the fight, because if you don't do that,
translation.es: Elimínala desde el principio. Porque si no lo haces,

translation.en: if you don't just put her down right away, man, she's gonna be trouble.
translation.es: si no la matas de inmediato, causará problemas.

translation.en: Beaver.
She's… She's just one of those women, you know?
She just likes to just get under your skin and just needle you, man.
translation.es: Disfruta de hacerte enfurecer e irritarte.

translation.en: Like a… like a fucking needle.
translation.es: Como un pinchazo de una maldita aguja.

translation.en: This is a setback and nothing more.
translation.es: Es un contratiempo y nada más.

translation.en: Setback?
Hey, did you hear that? It's a setback. That's cool.
translation.es: Qué alivio. ¿Oíste? Es solo un contratiempo.

translation.en: She shot the goddamn missile out of the sky!
It's one missile. There are 15 left.
And what happens if she shoots them down too, huh?
What then? What do we do then?
Our faces, man, they're all over the world right now.
translation.es: Todo el mundo vio nuestras caras.

translation.en: What do we do then?
What's the statute of limitations on attempted nuking?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la condena por bombardeo nuclear?

translation.en: We are prepared for this. We have backup plans.
Really?
You played that one pretty close to the buzzer.
translation.es: Nos hizo esperar hasta último momento.

translation.en: Doing my best here, ma'am.
Can you turn off the TV coverage?
Give me a minute.
Not from here.
Understood.
How long till the SEALS get here?
Fifty minutes. They're going as fast as they can.
translation.es: En 50 minutos, van a toda velocidad.

translation.en: Not fast enough.
And we got some background on Alexander Kessel.
He was Army, military intelligence. Started out doing Russian work,
translation.es: Trabajó en inteligencia militar, comenzó en investigación.

translation.en: then became a psy ops and torture specialist.
translation.es: Se especializó en ataques psicológicos, tortura.

translation.en: Torture?
He was good. Too good sometimes.
translation.es: Era muy bueno. A veces, hasta demasiado.

translation.en: Killed two prisoners while he was torturing them.
translation.es: Mató a dos prisioneros al torturarlos.

translation.en: Jesus. I'm dealing with a genuine psychopath.
translation.es: Diablos, me enfrento a un psicópata.

translation.en: You're not alone. Lot of smart people here trying to figure out a way to help you.
translation.es: No está sola. Tenemos muchas personas buscando la forma de ayudarla.

translation.en: Tacticians, game theorists.
Fuck theory. I need some fucking soldiers with guns.
translation.es: A la mierda con eso. ¡Necesito soldados con armas!

translation.en: I hear you, Captain.
Come on, give her some guns, man.
If you don't mind me saying, you are one armor- plated woman.
translation.es: Debo decirle que es una mujer extraordinaria.

translation.en: Army never should have picked a fight with you.
Got that right.
What'd I miss?
Not much.
Did we stop the missile?
Yeah. We stopped it.
Nice.
Wait. Where's all the bad guys?
That Alexander dude must be pissed at you.
Yeah, well, that's because I'm still fucking up his day.
translation.es: Lo sé. Es porque le sigo arruinando todo.

translation.en: Papa?
Hey. How you feeling?
You up for some soup?
Sure.
You saw what they did.
I'll take care of it.
Do not let them get to you now. Don't let them win.
translation.es: No te dejes intimidar. No les permitas ganar.

translation.en: They hate me.
You told the truth.
Nobody cares about the truth.
translation.es: A nadie le importa la verdad.

translation.en: I care.
I've lost everything. Everything I ever worked for.
translation.es: Perdí todo. Después de tanto esfuerzo…

translation.en: Hey, hey.
What's the one thing I've taught you since you were little?
translation.es: ¿Qué te enseñé desde que eras pequeña?

translation.en: The one rule in life?
Never stop fighting.
You got fight in you, kid.
Always have. Just like your mama.
translation.es: Desde siempre, al igual que tu madre.

translation.en: Captain?
He wants to talk.
How long have I been out?
Not long. Fifteen minutes or so.
What now, asshole?
You think I'm a monster.
I was.
You know, growing up, I never summered where I wintered.
translation.es: De niño, nunca veraneaba donde pasaba el invierno.

translation.en: I was either on a yacht in the Hamptons or skiing in Val d'Isère.
translation.es: Navegaba en un yate en Los Hamptons o esquiaba en Val d'Isère.

translation.en: Sucks to be you, dude.
I'm not complaining.
I was the product of a failed society.
translation.es: Fui producto de una sociedad fallida, que valora el dinero

translation.en: A society that consistently rewards money and ignores everything else.
translation.es: Fui producto de una sociedad fallida, que valora el dinero e ignora todo lo demás.

translation.en: What? You think my father became ambassador to the UN
translation.es: ¿Crees que mi padre es embajador ante la ONU

translation.en: because of any worthwhile diplomatic skills
or because of his political donations?
See, that's what we do in America.
translation.es: Es lo que hacemos en este país.

translation.en: We just figure because someone's rich that means they're smart.
translation.es: Pensamos que alguien rico es alguien inteligente.

translation.en: My father's a moron.
He inherited his money. - He didn't earn it. - God.
translation.es: - Heredó dinero, no lo ganó. - Cielos.

translation.en: Don't tell me this is about daddy issues.
I wouldn't expect you to understand.
I understand plenty.
Your father is a good man.
translation.es: Tu padre es un buen hombre.

translation.en: The best.
He served too, didn't he?
Thirty- six years.
That's how he met your mom? When he was stationed in Spain?
translation.es: ¿Así conoció a tu mamá? ¿Cuando estuvo en España?

translation.en: Does he still hang out with his army buddies?
Every day.
In Scottsdale, right?
Yeah.
The Patriot's Valley Veterans Retirement Home.
translation.es: En el hogar de retiro Patriot's Valley.

translation.en: Room 6B.
Papa?
Let him go! - He's got nothing to do with this! - Beg to differ.
translation.es: - ¡Déjalo! No tiene nada que ver con esto. - Difiero.

translation.en: Let him go!
You said I could kill whoever, and you'd never open this door.
translation.es: Prometiste no abrir la puerta sin importar a quién matara.

translation.en: Let him go, God damn you!
- Let's see if that's still valid. - Fuck you!
translation.es: Veamos si decías la verdad. ¡Vete a la mierda!

translation.en: You think it's going to go any other way?
This is what I was trained for. Psy ops. Military intelligence.
translation.es: Esto me enseñaron. Tortura, inteligencia militar.

translation.en: Find your enemy's weak point and exploit it.
translation.es: Encuentra un punto débil y explótalo.

translation.en: Let him go!
If you don't open the door, I will take apart your father piece by piece.
translation.es: Abre la puerta o despedazaré a tu padre de a poco.

translation.en: No!
- Fine. Have it your way. - No, no! Please.
translation.es: ¡No, por favor! Bueno, como tú quieras.

translation.en: No, no, no!
- Do it. - No, no, no! No, don't! No!
- No, no, no! -
- You know I can't. - Yes, you can.
translation.es: - Sabes que no puedo. - Sí que puedes.

translation.en: - No, I can't. - You can make this stop whenever you want.
Let me speak with him. Let me speak with him. Okay?
- Let me speak with him! - Captain, no.
Let her speak.
Papa?
- JJ. - I can't…
I can't… I can't lose you.
Listen to me. Are you listening?
Never stop fighting!
- Kill him. - No! No!
- No, please God. God! -
No!  No, no!
My daddy would have made me open that door.
translation.es: Yo abriría la puerta por mi padre.

translation.en: No question!
How did they know?
How did they know to have people in Scottsdale?
translation.es: ¿Cómo es que tenían gente en Scottsdale?

translation.en: The Army signed your transfer order last night, right?
translation.es: El ejército firmó tu orden de traslado anoche, ¿no?

translation.en: Right.
Which means they couldn't have known until a few hours ago.
translation.es: Entonces, debieron enterarse solo hace unas horas.

translation.en: You still don't get it? You're a pariah in your own ranks.
translation.es: ¿Aún no lo entiendes? Tu propia institución te excluye.

translation.en: The decision to have you transferred to this godforsaken rig
translation.es: La decisión de transferirte aquí se tomó hace tres días.

translation.en: was made three days ago. They only told you last night.
translation.es: La decisión de transferirte aquí se tomó hace tres días. Te lo dijeron anoche,

translation.en: I've known for 72 hours.
translation.es: pero hace 72 horas que lo sé.

translation.en: - What are you doing? - Activating my insurance policy.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces? Activo mi plan de contingencia.

translation.en: If she's committed enough to watch her father die,
translation.es: Tiene tanta convicción que dejó morir a su padre,

translation.en: you will find that I am equally as committed.
That's the HVAR code. The emergency sinking protocol.
translation.es: Es el protocolo de hundimiento de emergencia.

translation.en: You're going to sink this whole rig?
Our telemetry's saying SBX- 1's asset removal protocol just activated.
translation.es: Nos informaron que se activó el protocolo de eliminación de SBX-1.

translation.en: Don't tell me he-- He's going to sink us.
translation.es: - No me diga que… - Nos hundirá.

translation.en: He's going to sink us using our own scuttling protocol.
translation.es: Nos hundirá con nuestro propio protocolo.

translation.en: High value asset removal protocol activated.
What do we do?
As long as we are above the surface, we can still fire our missiles.
translation.es: Mientras flotemos, podemos disparar los misiles.

translation.en: Thirteen minutes until total vessel submersion.
translation.es: Trece minutos para la inmersión total de la nave.

translation.en: We've got 13 minutes to figure out a solution.
translation.es: Debemos pensar en algo en 13 minutos.

translation.en: I'm going down there.
Down where? Into the hulls?
Yes. To close the valves one by one.
translation.es: Sí. - Cerraré las válvulas manualmente. - No puede bajar, está herida.

translation.en: You can't go down there with wounds like that.
translation.es: - Cerraré las válvulas manualmente. - No puede bajar, está herida.

translation.en: I'll manage.
I'll… I'll go.
I'll do it.
You're running out of time. We clock it at 13 minutes.
So do we.
What's the ETA on the SEAL team?
Twenty- five.
Damn. I'll call you back.
All right.
Don't think this is what heroes look like.
translation.es: Así no es como se ve un héroe.

translation.en: That's exactly what they look like.
translation.es: Un héroe se ve exactamente así.

translation.en: Whatever you say, Captain.
You can do this.
You got this, Rahul.
You got this.
See you on the other side.
Little bastard grew some balls.
Take care of it.
This is mine.
HVAR's been activated. Twelve and a half minutes.
translation.es: Activamos el EAAV, quedan 12 minutos y medio.

translation.en: Well, how far away is he?
Twenty- two minutes out. Ready your weapons.
Okay, I've reached the hull.
You see the console?
This is gonna take a while.
- You just have to slow it down. - Copy that.
How are we looking, Captain?
Recalculating. Recalculating.
- 12 minutes 11 seconds until… - You just bought us two minutes.
translation.es: Está dando resultado. Tenemos dos minutos más.

translation.en: Keep going.
Hell, yeah. I'm an ass- kicking, valve- closing machine.
Nobody plugs leaks like me.
- Oh. Shit. - What?
I got company.
Get out of there. You hear me?
It's too late.
It's not too late. Get out of there, now.
translation.es: No es tarde. ¡Sal de ahí ya mismo!

translation.en: I'm sorry I couldn't help you more before, Captain,
translation.es: Lamento no haber sido de ayuda antes.

translation.en: but I'm hoping this helps you now.
Recalculating. Recalculating.
Tell my children I love them.
translation.es: Que mis hijos sepan que los quiero.

translation.en: Howdy.
You don't have to do this, Beaver.
translation.es: No tienes por qué hacer esto.

translation.en: You're not a murderer.
You're right.
I'm not a murderer.
I'm a fucking patriot.
Rahul?
Rahul?
Shah can't come to the phone right now.
It's just you and the three of us.
You're dead.
It was a valiant attempt.
I admire his courage, truly.
To be honest, I'd written him off.
His psych evaluation said he'd fold under pressure. I didn't even bother to put people on his family.
translation.es: Asumí que se rendiría bajo presión, no buscamos a su familia.

translation.en: Turns out, he almost derailed me.
No, I have a new one.
ZSB, Zulu, Sierra, Bravo, 1- 9- 9- 6.
Tell Danny to move in.
Danny?
Cut the feed.
That means nothing.
Then you won't mind if I show it to the world.
translation.es: Pues no te importará si todos lo ven.

translation.en: Fine.
What the hell just happened?
ZSB. Zurich Schweitz Bank.
That's a Swiss bank account.
I should have known.
You're not a nuclear terrorist or a fanatic.
You've been paid for this.
Hey, this is my operation. I'm the one in charge.
translation.es: Es mi operación, yo soy quien está a cargo.

translation.en: So what if I'm getting paid? Huh? Am I wrong?
I'm destroying a system that tried to destroy you.
translation.es: Destruiré un sistema que intentó destruirte.

translation.en: I'm making sure what happened to you doesn't happen to other women.
translation.es: Lo que te pasó no le pasará a ninguna otra mujer.

translation.en: How much?
What are you doing?
Who's paying you?
Seriously, stop with the tape.
translation.es: En serio, basta con la cinta.

translation.en: What about the Russian sub?
Stop taping the window?
The Danilov, huh? Yeah, how's Danny?
Can you please… Please stop taping the window. For me?
translation.es: ¿Podrías dejar eso? Deja de pegar la cinta. ¿Por mí?

translation.en: You paid off a sub captain. Where is he taking you?
Stop taping the window.
Someplace you can get a new name, a new face?
translation.es: ¿Irás a algún lugar con otro nombre, otro rostro?

translation.en: Somewhere you can spend your blood money?
Stop with the damn tape, JJ.
translation.es: Deja la maldita cinta, J. J.

translation.en: What about all that shit about your father?
Oh, fuck him. He ruined my family's name!
translation.es: Que se pudra, arruinó nuestra reputación.

translation.en: Today I restore it with dignity and respect.
Bullshit. I saw your file.
You're just a total fucking psycho.
- Thank you. - For what?
- For showing me your weakness. - Oh, yeah. What's that?
You want to get out of here alive.
translation.es: Quieres salir de aquí con vida.

translation.en: You know what else I want? I want to hurt you, JJ.
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué más? Quiero lastimarte, J. J.

translation.en: I want to cut off your fingers. I want you to beg me to kill you!
translation.es: Quiero cortarte los dedos. ¡Me rogarás que te mate!

translation.en: Cabrón.
translation.es: Fue tu elección, J. J. Elegiste ser…

translation.en: Good job cutting the live feed. SEALS are 17 minutes out.
translation.es: Buen trabajo con la transmisión. Los refuerzos llegarán en 17 minutos.

translation.en: Well, that's not fast enough.
This rig is going to sink in 15 minutes.
translation.es: La plataforma se hundirá en 15 minutos.

translation.en: And the second it goes under, these assholes will launch all their nukes.
translation.es: En cuanto se hunda, estos imbéciles lanzarán los misiles.

translation.en: Is there anything you can do?
I sort of have this plan.
- But it's a little counterintuitive. - Let's hear it, Captain.
translation.es: Quizá parezca ilógico. Somos todo oídos.

translation.en: I let them take the command center.
translation.es: Dejaré que tomen el centro de mando.

translation.en: What? That's precisely what we don't want to happen.
This rig is going down, and when it sinks, they win.
translation.es: Cuando la plataforma se hunda, ganarán.

translation.en: We have to force them to fire the missiles before that happens.
translation.es: Los forzaré a lanzar los misiles antes de que suceda.

translation.en: And then what?
And then I retake the command center and intercept their nukes.
translation.es: Luego retomaré el centro de mando e interceptaré los misiles.

translation.en: Inside 12 minutes?
Yes, sir.
Hold on.
Fuck.
Our game theory specialist is not convinced.
translation.es: A nuestro experto no le convence.

translation.en: He's uh… concerned about your motivations.
By my calculations,
your proposed plan has a 14% chance of success.
translation.es: su plan tiene un 14 % de probabilidad de funcionar.

translation.en: To give up that command center to a superior force with no certainty of regaining it
translation.es: Ceder el centro de mando sin la certeza de recuperarlo

translation.en: is what we refer to as a negative outcome inducing event.
translation.es: puede inducir un resultado altamente negativo.

translation.en: Are you serious with this shit?
Are you willing to gamble every life in America on your ability to retake the center?
translation.es: ¿Apostará la vida de todos en su capacidad de retomar el centro?

translation.en: I am.
I'm sorry. I cannot endorse such a move.
translation.es: Lo siento, no puedo aprobar ese plan.

translation.en: Listen, genius. You're saying my plan is running at 14%?
translation.es: Escucha, genio. ¿Mi plan tiene 14 % de probabilidad?

translation.en: Yours is zero!
You haven't been beat up, strangled, or shot defending this rig today.
translation.es: No te han golpeado ni herido por defender esta plataforma.

translation.en: So I think you'll find I'm kind of fucking motivated here.
translation.es: ¡Pues entenderás que estoy más que motivada!

translation.en: We hear you, Captain.
I can do this, sir. I know I can.
Half the people here think you're crazy. The other half think you're a rock star.
translation.es: Aquí, unos piensan que está loca y otros que es brillante.

translation.en: Fortunately, I'm one of the latter.
translation.es: Por suerte, yo creo que es brillante.

translation.en: Do what you have to do, Captain.
Still there?
- What do you think? - I think you're getting nervous.
translation.es: ¿Tú qué crees? Que te estás poniendo nervioso. Si fracasas, tus socios te matarán.

translation.en: If you fail here, your partners will kill you.
translation.es: Que te estás poniendo nervioso. Si fracasas, tus socios te matarán.

translation.en: You want this room? Come and get it.
Intercom off.
Give me the radio.
Beaver, what's your ETA?  About 30 seconds.
She's taped up the window. I can't see in the room.
translation.es: Tapó la ventana, no veo el interior.

translation.en: I need you to get in there now.
Relax. I'm there.
I ain't see her. She gone.
What do you mean, gone? Where is she?
Shit.
What?
She's on the roof.
Attention all missile teams, we have control of the interceptor.
Fire all missiles. Repeat, fire all missiles.
translation.es: Lancen todos los misiles. Repito, lancen todos los misiles.

translation.en: Multiple missile launch detected. Multiple missile launch detected.
translation.es: Se detectó un lanzamiento de misiles.

translation.en: Woo! Let's go, baby. Light 'em up!
Targets acquired. Targets acquired.
Chicago, Cincinnati, Atlanta, Miami, Washington DC,
translation.es: Chicago, Cincinnati, Atlanta, Miami, Washington D. C.,

translation.en: Boston, New York, Dallas, Philadelphia.
Kill her.
She come for me.
Come make ten million, he says.
translation.es: Ven a ganar diez millones, me dijo.

translation.en: Buy yourself a private island, he says. Piece of cake.
translation.es: Podrás comprarte una isla, y será pan comido.

translation.en: Oh, man.
Nope.
Give me your knife.
Do it.
Acid.
Where are you, darlin'?
Come out, come out, wherever you are.
Apologies, ladies and gentlemen, for that rude interruption,
translation.es: Me disculpo, damas y caballeros, por la interrupción.

translation.en: but as you can see,
translation.es: Como pueden ver, he vuelto a tomar este centro de mando

translation.en: I have retaken this command center and the nukes are on their way.
translation.es: Como pueden ver, he vuelto a tomar este centro de mando y hemos lanzado los misiles.

translation.en: Hey, the goalie ain't up here.
translation.es: Oye, la portera no está aquí.

translation.en: She has to be. Where else could she…
…be?
She is on the roof, Beaver.
There's no one down here.
Intercept launch expires in eight minutes.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en ocho minutos.

translation.en: Intercept launch expires in seven minutes.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en siete minutos.

translation.en: Come on.
Can't let you do that, darlin'.
translation.es: No puedo dejar que lo hagas.

translation.en: Let me go, Beaver. You don't want this.
translation.es: Déjame ir, Mapache. No es lo que quieres.

translation.en: Hell, I told you what I wanted.
translation.es: Diablos, ya te dije lo que quería.

translation.en: You're gonna die here.
No, I'm not.
I'm on the next submarine out of here.
translation.es: Me iré en el próximo submarino.

translation.en: With Alexander?
He's gone.
- - Bullshit.
I saw him go.
Intercept launch expires in five minutes.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en cinco minutos.

translation.en: Really think a little bit of razor wire is gonna kill me?
translation.es: ¿Crees que un alambre de púas me matará?

translation.en: Gravity, darlin'.
JJ… JJ, come on.
What's the one thing I've taught you since you were little?
translation.es: ¿Qué te enseñé desde que eras pequeña?

translation.en: The one rule in life?
Never stop fighting.
Intercept launch expires in three minutes.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en tres minutos.

translation.en: Intercept launch expires in 60 seconds.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en 60 segundos.

translation.en: There she is!
There she is!
Get up. Get up!
Intercept launch expires in 40 seconds.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en 40 segundos.

translation.en: Don't give up. Don't give up.
translation.es: No te rindas. No te rindas.

translation.en: Intercept launch expires in 30 seconds.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en 30 segundos.

translation.en: Intercept launch expires in 20 seconds.
translation.es: El lanzamiento del interceptor expira en 20 segundos.

translation.en: Ten seconds. Nine, eight, seven, six,
translation.es: Diez segundos. Nueve, ocho, siete, seis,

translation.en: five, four, three, two, one.
Interceptors launched.
Come on. Come on. Come on.
Multiple missile interception complete.
Yeah! Woo- hoo!
Fourteen percent.
Look at you.
Still going, huh?
You know you really did fuck up my day.
But I brought America to the brink,
translation.es: Pero llevé al país al límite de la extinción,

translation.en: and I'll do it again.
You may have won the battle, but not the war.
translation.es: Ganaste la batalla, pero no la guerra.

translation.en: Told you. War's not over yet.
translation.es: Ya te lo dije. La guerra no ha terminado.

translation.en: This is for my dad, asshole.
There's my ride.
There's no room for you.
I've arrived. I can see him.
You know what to do.
What about the woman?
Your choice.
Target in sight. We'll arrive in 30 seconds.
translation.es: Objetivo a la vista. Aterrizaje en 30 segundos.

translation.en: Contact. Russian submarine looks like it's bugging out.
translation.es: Parece que el submarino ruso se retira.

translation.en: We have visual on Captain Collins on the roof.
translation.es: Veo a la capitana Collins en el techo.

translation.en: Madam President.
They told me you were awake. It is good to see you, Captain.
translation.es: Oí que estaba despierta. Me alegra verla, capitana.

translation.en: Is Fort Greely--
Greely's back up. Interceptors on standby.
translation.es: Lo recuperamos. El interceptor opera con normalidad.

translation.en: And we're going to replace SBX- 1 as soon as possible,
but don't worry, nobody is going to send you back out there.
translation.es: No se preocupe, no la enviaremos de nuevo allí.

translation.en: In fact, I think a soldier of your caliber
translation.es: De hecho, creo que una soldado como usted

translation.en: would be better put to use on my National Security staff.
translation.es: se ha ganado un lugar en mi equipo de Seguridad Nacional.

translation.en: What do you say?
I'll take that as a yes.
Thank you, Madam President.
Oh, and you have another visitor.
- Papa? - JJ.
I… I thought you were…
Turns out your dad has some very well- armed Army buddies
translation.es: Parece que su padre tiene amigos bien entrenados

translation.en: watching over him in that retirement home.
They saw what was happening on TV. Broke down my goddamn door.
translation.es: Vieron lo que pasaba en la televisión y derribaron la puerta.

translation.en: Saved my finger. Lost my door.
translation.es: No perdí el dedo, pero sí la puerta.

translation.en: Well, I'll expect you to report to the White House next week, Captain.
translation.es: Espero verla en la Casa Blanca la semana próxima, capitana.

translation.en: Come here. Dad.
This is for you.
Another survivor.
SEAL team found him swimming around the wreckage of SBX- 1.
translation.es: La hallaron nadando alrededor de los restos de SBX-1.

translation.en: He belonged to Corporal Shah.
I heard what happened. I'm sorry.
translation.es: Me enteré de lo que pasó. Lo siento.

translation.en: You know, sometimes it's…
translation.es: ¿Sabes? A veces es mejor hablar de los que perdimos,

translation.en: it's best to talk about those we've lost so we don't forget.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? A veces es mejor hablar de los que perdimos, para no olvidarnos.

translation.en: His name was Rahul.
Rahul?
He liked poker…  I see.
…but he wasn't very good at it.
